Course Information.Course Title: Storytelling and Storyboarding with Generative AI

Learning Outcomes: LO1: Use generative AI techniques to develop compelling script elements enriched with narrative structure and creative storytelling.
LO2: Identify effective prompt terms and narrative components to enhance AI-generated storyboards for visual storytelling.
LO3: Utilise generative AI tools to refine video scripts for clarity, tone, and narrative consistency.
LO4: Analyse generative AI outputs for ethical issues, bias, and copyright risks, applying appropriate corrective actions.
Knowledge: K1: AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline and character development, scenario iterations
K2: Copyright law covering Gen AI usage
K3: Gen AI tool limitations and solutions
K4: Awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data reproduced in output
K5: Best Practices to minimise plagiarism risk
K6: AI tools for script analysis and market research
K7: Gen AI and Ethics awareness
K8: Basic Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and tools relevant to AI Text generation
K9: Creative principles and storytelling in AI generated text prompts
K10: Basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation
Ability: A1: Analyse AI output for bias and taking corrective steps
A2: Utilise NLP techniques and tools to enhance the quality and effectiveness of AI-generated story elements
A3: Apply ethical considerations in the selection of prompts and reference usage
A4: Filter and Script-edit Gen-AI output
A5: Use AI-generated text techniques and methodologies to develop script elements
A6: Apply and adjust relevant prompts in the generative process to improve iterations
A7: Identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform to ideate and iterate story elements for incorporation into text prompts
A8: Incorporate unique creative principles and storytelling elements into AI-generated story ideas to avoid generic replication
A9: Identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid copyright infringement

TSC Title: AI Content Generation for Script Development
Topics: Topic 2: Basic AI models for script generation (K10)
Topic 3: Storytelling and storyboarding with generative AI (A8)
Topic 4: Generating stories with generative AI (A5)
Topic 2: Storyboard breakdown and text prompts for images (A7)
Topic 3: AI tool limitation and solutions to generate better images (K3)
Topic 4: Apply iterative approach to image generation (A6)
Topic 1: AI Video tools for generating text, voiceover and video (K8, A2)
Topic 2: Generating AI video for storyboard (K6, A4)
Topic 1: Gen AI and ethics awareness (K7)
Topic 2: Best Practices to minimise plagiarism risk (K5, A3)
Topic 3: Analyse AI output for bias and taking corrective steps (K4, A1)
Topic 4: Copyright risk and avoid copyright infringement (K2, A9)
Learning Units: LU4: Generative AI Ethics and Best Practices

Details: Explore the core elements of storytelling, including plot, character, and setting.
Discuss the role of creative principles in crafting engaging narratives.
Analyze examples of successful storytelling in various media.
Understand how to incorporate storytelling techniques into AI-generated content.
Exercises on developing narrative structures using AI tools.

Description.Topic: Topic 2: Basic AI models for script generation (K10)
Details: Introduction to AI algorithms and models used in text generation.
Examine the capabilities and limitations of current AI models for scriptwriting.
Hands-on practice with AI tools for generating script elements.
Discussion on the evolution of AI in creative writing.
Case studies of AI-generated scripts in the industry.

Description.Topic: Topic 3: Storytelling and storyboarding with generative AI (A8)
Details: Learn how to integrate storytelling elements into AI-generated storyboards.
Techniques for avoiding generic replication in AI-generated content.
Workshop on creating unique storyboards using generative AI.
Explore the synergy between narrative and visual elements in storyboarding.
Evaluate the effectiveness of AI-generated storyboards in storytelling.

Description.Topic: Topic 4: Generating stories with generative AI (A5)
Details: Utilize AI-generated text techniques to develop compelling story elements.
Strategies for enhancing narrative creativity using AI tools.
Practical exercises on generating stories with AI.
Discussion on the role of AI in modern storytelling.
Explore the potential of AI in creating diverse and inclusive narratives.
Understand the basics of storyboarding and its importance in visual storytelling.
Learn techniques for world-building and character development in storyboards.
Exercises on creating effective storyboards for different media.
Analyze successful storyboards and their impact on storytelling.
Discussion on the role of AI in enhancing storyboard creation.

Description.Topic: Topic 2: Storyboard breakdown and text prompts for images (A7)
Details: Learn how to break down storyboards into key visual elements.
Techniques for creating effective text prompts for AI-generated images.
Hands-on practice with AI tools for generating storyboard images.
Explore the relationship between text prompts and visual storytelling.
Evaluate the effectiveness of AI-generated images in storyboards.

Description.Topic: Topic 3: AI tool limitation and solutions to generate better images (K3)
Details: Identify common limitations of AI tools in image generation.
Explore solutions to overcome these limitations and improve image quality.
Discussion on the impact of AI tool limitations on creative processes.
Hands-on practice with advanced AI tools for image enhancement.
Case studies of successful AI-generated images in media.

Description.Topic: Topic 4: Apply iterative approach to image generation (A6)
Details: Learn the importance of iteration in improving AI-generated images.
Techniques for applying iterative processes to enhance image quality.
Workshop on refining AI-generated images through iteration.
Explore the role of feedback in the iterative process.
Discussion on the impact of iteration on creative outcomes.

Description.Topic: Topic 1: AI Video tools for generating text, voiceover and video (K8, A2)
Details: Introduction to AI tools for generating video content.
Learn how to create text, voiceover, and video using AI.
Hands-on practice with AI video tools for content creation.
Explore the integration of NLP techniques in video generation.
Discussion on the impact of AI on video production.

Description.Topic: Topic 2: Generating AI video for storyboard (K6, A4)
Details: Learn how to generate AI videos based on storyboards.
Techniques for script-editing AI-generated video content.
Workshop on creating AI videos for visual storytelling.
Explore the role of AI in enhancing video narratives.
Evaluate the effectiveness of AI-generated videos in storytelling.

Description.Topic: Topic 1: Gen AI and ethics awareness (K7)
Details: Understand the ethical considerations in using generative AI.
Discuss the impact of AI on privacy, bias, and misinformation.
Explore the role of ethics in AI content creation.
Case studies on ethical challenges in AI-generated content.
Strategies for promoting ethical AI practices in media.

Description.Topic: Topic 2: Best Practices to minimise plagiarism risk (K5, A3)
Details: Learn best practices for minimizing plagiarism in AI-generated content.
Discuss the importance of ethical considerations in prompt selection.
Techniques for ensuring originality in AI-generated scripts.
Workshop on applying ethical practices in AI content creation.
Explore the impact of plagiarism on creative industries.

Description.Topic: Topic 3: Analyse AI output for bias and taking corrective steps (K4, A1)
Details: Learn how to identify and analyze bias in AI-generated content.
Techniques for taking corrective steps to address bias.
Discussion on the impact of bias on AI content quality.
Hands-on practice with tools for bias detection and correction.
Explore the role of bias awareness in ethical AI practices.

Description.Topic: Topic 4: Copyright risk and avoid copyright infringement (K2, A9)
Details: Understand copyright laws related to generative AI usage.
Learn how to identify and avoid copyright infringement in AI content.
Discussion on the impact of copyright risks on creative processes.
Techniques for ensuring compliance with copyright regulations.
Case studies on copyright challenges in AI-generated content.
